Python Module Index

g | l
 
g
gui
    gui.desmearing_gui Uses Enthought's Traits+Chaco, best effort so far in Python
    gui.only_chaco Explore Chaco by adding a GUI plot for lake-python
    gui.only_traits Explore Traits by building a GUI for lake-python
    gui.traits_editor Example code from Enthought showing Traits+Chaco
 
l
lake
    lake.desmear desmear the 1-D SAS data (q, I, dI) by method of Lake & Jemian
    lake.extrap_constant Extrapolate as: I(q) = B
    lake.extrap_linear Extrapolate as: I(q) = B + m * q
    lake.extrap_porod Extrapolate as: I(q) = B + Cp / q^4
    lake.extrap_power Extrapolate as: I(q) = A * q^p
    lake.extrapolation superclass of functions for extrapolation of SAS data past available range
    lake.info parameters used by the desmearing methods
    lake.lake command-line program to run desmearing
    lake.smear lake.smear is used by lake.desmear to forward smear a test case.
    lake.StatsReg set of statistics registers in the style of a pocket calculator
    lake.textplots make ASCII plots on a text only screen
    lake.toolbox suite of utility routines
